name: automart
description: automart is an online market place for automobiles of diverse makes, body types, models. with automart users can sell their cars(used and new) and buy from trusted dealers.

scripts.pretest: node -r @babel/register migrations/dropDatabase && node -r @babel/register migrations/createUsersTable  && node -r @babel/register migrations/createCarsTable  && node -r @babel/register migrations/createOrdersTable && node -r @babel/register migrations/createFlagsTable
scripts.runtest: NODE_ENV=test && mocha -r @babel/register server/test/users --exit && mocha -r @babel/register server/test/car --exit && mocha -r @babel/register server/test/order --exit && mocha -r @babel/register server/test/flag  --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Mba Ifeanyi.
